"Ah...": "Dad and the guardsfolks usually did their training here. They were so loud, you could hear them train from anywhere in the village."
"I was never allowed to train with them, though."
"\"You're not ready for this training yet, so just watch and learn for now.\" Dad would say to me."
"So I did. Watching them train was all I was ever allowed to do."
"Trust me, it's just as boring as it sounds."
"Anyways, it doesn't look like we'll find anything good here. Let's check the coastline."
